fuzzing_params.Constraints: coordinate1.length == coordinate2.length == 2, 'a' <= coordinate1[0], coordinate2[0] <= 'h', '1' <= coordinate1[1], coordinate2[1] <= '8'

problem_info.title: 3274. Check if Two Chessboard Squares Have the Same Color
test_examples: Example 1: Input: coordinate1 = a1, coordinate2 = c3 Output: true Explanation: Both squares are black.
Example 2: Input: coordinate1 = a1, coordinate2 = h3 Output: false Explanation: Square a1 is black and h3 is white.
